For overall extra ordinary performance of students in INDIAN TALENT exam 2018-19 , school has been chosen as one of the top 100 best schools at national Level. Indian Talent group has awarded the school with “GOLDEN SCHOOL AWARD at National level “
Received GLOBAL TEACHER AWARD 2018. Nearly 28 Asian countries have participated in GLOBAL TEACHER CONGRESS 2018, NEW DELHI, in Sept 2018, stood 28th rank out of 100 members selected for the award
Innovation in Early Learning Award received in Global Triumph Education Summit 2018, GTF is a leading global analytical company in providing ratings ,research and insight market research company
Outstanding contribution to Education Award received in GTF Leadership Summit & Awards 2018
Counsellor & Counsellor of the Year 2018 Award received in GTF Women Excellence Summit & Awards 2018, 29th September -2018, Bengaluru
Ranked No.1 in the top 10 Pre schools in India under the parameter for “Parental involvement” – Survey conducted by Education today
2nd Rank for Jagadeeswari School of Learning students at Heritage Cultural Fest – 2017 – out of 11, 600 students across Hyderabad, Secunderabad

Jagadeeswari School of Learning children won 12 gold, 16 silver, 13 bronze medals and also won Rolling trophy for bagging more medals in the South Zonal level Mini Edisports organised by MDN education Pvt Ltd among 15 schools
“The most emerging School in South zone” award presented by MDN Education Pvt Ltd., Hyderabad
Jury’s Choice award presented by Education today.(India’s Top 10 pre-schools for the exemplary contribution to the education field)
Best pre-school award-2013 among 250+ Edify schools across India
Bagged top 6 out of 10 medals and won Best School award in colouring competition among 4000 pre-schools students participated in twin cities of Hyderabad & Secunderabad
Children Won 1st and 2nd prizes in on-line drawing competition among 150+ Edify schools across India
Indian Educational Achievers Awards 2019-20 Function @ Radisson Blu, Mumbai On 25th June.
